title: /GBA ROM/ Pokemon - Shiny Gold _Taku51_ RELEASE
description:

Please visit http://www.freewebs(dot)com/redarrow77/index.htm to request me to upload more roms!!! and check out the forums



\Pokemon - Shiny gold version//

Pokemon Shiny Gold is a remake of the classic pokemon game Pokemon gold. The graphics have been greatly enhanced so try it out.

To use

1.Extract Shiny gold.zip 
**2.Run the IPS file**
3.Open the 1636 - Pokemon - Fire Red Version.GBA file with the emulator of your choice

**Step number 2 may not be needed so mac users try downloading it anyways**
*I recommend you use VBA(Virtual boy Advance)*

Happy gaming ;)
